title: DSP Advertising Campaign
description: Adobe Advertising Cloud DSP Campaign Details.

dsp:campaignStatus.title: Campaign Status
dsp:campaignStatus.description: Campaign Status extracted from the Insertion Order associated with this campaign.Indicates if underlying ads are eligible to serve.

dsp:userId.title: User Identifier
dsp:userId.description: Identifier for the user who created the campaign.

dsp:feeClass.title: The Fee Class
dsp:feeClass.description: Fee Class needed for computing the total spend.

dsp:campaignStartTime.title: Campaign start time.
dsp:campaignStartTime.description: The insertion order fields representing campaign start time.

dsp:campaignEndTime.title: Campaign end time.
dsp:campaignEndTime.description: The insertion order fields representing campaign end time.

dsp:accountId.title: Account Identifier
dsp:accountId.description: Identifier for the account owning this campaign.

dsp:advertiserId.title: Advertiser Identifier
dsp:advertiserId.description: Identifier for the advertiser owning this campaign.
